REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F Y f0195 reute d f BC-POGO-<PPP>-CONSOLIDAT 03-02 0051

TEXT.TITLE: POGO <PPP> CONSOLIDATES TWO DIVISIONS
TEXT.BODY: Pogo Producing Co said it has consolidated its onshore and offshore Gulf Coast divisions into a Southern Division responsible for its onshore and offshore oil and gas exploration and development activities in the Gulf Coast and Gulf of Mexico areas. Reuter
